longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of temporary passports. 

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 15 days: 
 - for nationals of Netherlands;
Visa Issuance:
- Visitors arriving from a country without Kazakh
  representation and holding an invitation letter, can obtain
  a single entry visa on arrival for a max. stay of 1 month if
  visa is pre-arranged by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
  Fee: approx. USD 80.-. Applicable only at Aktau (SCO),
  Almaty (ALA), Astana (TSE), Atyrau (GUW) and Uralsk (URA).
Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Netherlands will be expected
  to hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
Warning:
- Visitors who are visa exempt but do not hold return/onward
  tickets could be refused entry.
- Passengers holding tourist visas must also hold hotel
  vouchers
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required if arriving within 6
days after leaving or transiting countries with risk of yellow
fever transmission For details, click here.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 9 months of age. 
- Passengers transiting countries with risk of yellow fever
  transmission provided not leaving the transit areas.
